featured.text: Here is a sentence: “Almost nothing of a fish is left for the trash bin.” Which paragraph is most suitable to have it as the final sentence?
She often scores A in sentence-combining tests.
What does erratic in the last sentence imply?
Mrs. Tuck kills the man and is jailed and sentenced to be executed.

other.text: Here is a sentence: “This design was adopted in later traffic light designs across the world.”
The sentence written on the board is .
Which paragraph is most suitable to have it as the final sentence?

definition.zh_def: 句子是由詞組成的語言單位，表達一個完整的思想或意義。
definition.en_def: A sentence is a set of words that conveys a complete thought or idea.
definition.example: She wrote a beautiful sentence in her poem.
